subject: DHL COURIER COMPANY,
body:
DHL COURIER COMPANY,
Office Address: DHL Express ServicePoint, 1240 Forest Pkwy # 400, West
Deptford, NJ 08066,
United States
Attention Dear Customer  ,
Iâ€™m Mr. Lawrence Richard , The new appointed Manager of DHL Office at
West Deptford, NJ 08066 . I assumed this office on 12th, December ,
2022. On going through the files of the previous records of this
office, I discovered that there are 15 parcels containing ATM cards
each one attached with an email address of the owner on it. The former
appointee of this office (Mr James Walsh) failed to carry out the
delivery as it was instructed and programmed. Probably, one of his
reasons for not carrying out the delivery was because of your
Non-Compliance Of Official Processes and Unbelief Of The Reality Of
Your Genuine Visa Card.
According to the content recorded in each file, the ATM card was
deposited by Mr Wilson Garland who died one year back as a manager of
Zenith Bank United Kingdom . On the statement he wrote on the list, he
stated that each of the aforementioned ATM cards contains the sum of
US$4,500,000.00 and was supposed to transfer to you through his bank
but due to your unable to finish the process he uploaded the money to
their ATM Visa card and registered with DHL office before he died. The
deposit information of the PARCEL  are as follows,
Deposit Number: DHL/102p/parcel/2022
Sort/Clearance Code: 0545810
Deposit Certificate N0.: 863177
Reference File: (RE - 2022 - V)
Package Description: 1 SIGNED and SEALED PARCEL.( ATM CARD)
Depositor: Mr.Mr Wilson Garland
MS 37995
Documents;Secured.
Meanwhile, I've made the arrangement of posting the 15 parcels through
our DHL fast delivery to the 15 of you to your respective mailing
addresses. Am also sending the same message of the same content to 15
of you that own the 10 abandoned ATM CARDS each at the same time. If
found in spam folder, it could be due to your Internet Service
Provider, ISP. So move to your inbox before your reply.
I went to our head office at Plantation, FL and reported the issue of
the discovered 15 ATM cards in my office and they verified it and gave
me the veto order to carry out the delivery immediately you reconfirm
your mailing address to this office in order for us to mail the ATM
CARD directly to you. Note, below information is officially needed for
the sending of the card and a service charge of $130 for DHL new
official stamp.
Full name:
Full mailing info:
Your cell phone line:
Country:
Nearest Airport:
A.Copy of your I`D:
I will send your ATM Card once you update us with the above info and
you shall be given a tracking number, that is, the Track and Trace
number of your parcel once it is posted to your mailing address, so as
to enable you track your parcel to know exactly when it will arrive to
your mailing address.
We give you 100% assurance that once this fee is confirmed, your ATM
PARCEL will be in your hand within the space of 12 hours without any
other obstruction.
Remain blessed as I'll be looking forward to receiving your immediate response.
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Lawrence Richard .
New Appointed Manager
DHL Express Worldwide

subject: Re:   DHL COURIER COMPANY,
body:
Hello Mr. Lawrence Richard,

Thank you for reaching out and congratulations on your new appointment as the Manager of DHL Office at West Deptford, NJ. It's quite a surprise to hear about these ATM cards. I must admit, it's not every day one hears about such things.

I'm curious though, how did Mr. Wilson Garland come to have my email address? And why would he choose to deposit such a large sum of money onto an ATM card for me? 

Also, could you please explain more about this official stamp fee? Is it a standard procedure for all DHL deliveries or is it specific to this case?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mitchell
